title: RNA metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for processing metrics of a RNA-seq library.

estimated_number_of_cells.title: Estimated number of cells
estimated_number_of_cells.description: Number of barcodes associated with cell-containing partitions, estimated from UMI counts.

median_genes_per_cell.title: Median genes per cell
median_genes_per_cell.description: Median number of genes detected (with nonzero UMI counts) across cell-associated barcodes.

percent_reads_mapped_to_genome.title: Percent reads mapped to the genome
percent_reads_mapped_to_genome.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to genome

percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_geno.title: Percent rreads mapped confidently to genome
percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_geno.description: Percentage of reads that mapped confidently to genome

percent_reads_mapped_antisense_to_gene.title: Percent reads mapped antisense to a gene
percent_reads_mapped_antisense_to_gene.description: Percentage of reads that mapped antisense to a gene

percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_tran.title: Percent reads mapped confidently to the transcriptome
percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_tran.description: Percentage of reads mapped to a unique gene in the transcriptome with high mapping quality score.

percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_exon.title: Percent reads mapped confidently to exonic regions
percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_exon.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the exonic regions of the genome with high mapping quality score.

percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_intr.title: Percent reads mapped confidently to intronic regions
percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_intr.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the intronic regions of genome with a high mapping quality score.

percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_inte.title: Percent reads mapped confidently to intergenic regions
percent_reads_mapped_confidently_to_inte.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the intergenic regions of the genome with a high mapping quality score.

percent_q30_bases_in_rna_read.title: Percent Q30 bases in rna read
percent_q30_bases_in_rna_read.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the RNA read sequence

percent_q30_bases_in_rna_read_2.title: Percent Q30 bases in rna read2
percent_q30_bases_in_rna_read_2.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the RNA read2 sequence
percent_q30_bases_in_rna_read_2.comment: Output only if cellranger assay chemistry is SC5P-PE, as a result of R1 being sequenced longer than 28 bases

total_genes_detected.title: Total genes detected
total_genes_detected.description: The number of genes with at least one UMI count in any cell.

median_umi_counts_per_cell.title: Median umi counts per cell
median_umi_counts_per_cell.description: The median number of total UMI counts across all cell-associated barcodes.
